practice_phrases: I didn't say I hope that
I didn't say I know many
I didn't say I hope I'll be able to

我没有说我认识很多喜欢看电视的人
I didn't say I hoped you would be able to speak better
我没有说我希望你能说得更好

I hope I'll be able to finish that soon
我希望我很快能完成那个
I wonder if she'll be able to finish in a day
我想知道她能不能在一天内完成
I needed enough time to be able to finish in a day
我需要足够的时间能在一天内完成
I didn't say I hoped I would be able to finish in a day
我没有说我希望我能在一天内完成
I didn't say within a day
I wonder if I'll be able to finish within a day
我想知道我能不能在一天内完成

她说她希望她能在一天内完成
